## AuthGuard.requireMinimumRole() method

Ensures that a route can only accessed when a user has a specific role

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static requireMinimumRole(role: keyof Role, resources?: CheckResource[]): express.Handler[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  role | keyof [Role](./clm-core.role.md) | The minimum required role to access that role [Role](./clm-core.role.md) |
|  resources | [CheckResource](./clm-core.checkresource.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of resources which need to be authorized |

<b>Returns:</b>

express.Handler\[\]
